content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (52.0, -80.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) with a burner inserter at position (53.5, -78.5) and a transport belt at position (53.5, -79.5).

### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (62.0, -54.0) with an iron plate output.

### Chest at position (52.5, -82.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (52.5, -82.5) with no inventory.

### Belt Group
Consists of a belt group with inputs at position (51.5, -84.5) and outputs at position (53.5, -78.5), connecting the furnace at position (52.0, -80.0) to the burner inserter at position (53.5, -78.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from furnace
- Make sure the furnace has the desired item to extract before attempting to extract.
- Ensure the furnace is not empty or does not have any warnings before extracting items.

### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the burner inserter has a valid source and destination before attempting to use it.
- Make sure the burner inserter has enough fuel before attempting to use it.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
* The agent has attempted to extract items from the furnace multiple times, resulting in errors.
* The agent has successfully placed entities on the map, including furnaces, burners, and belts.
